summary:
Enthusiastic and optimistic professional, passionate about new challenges.

My versatile profile and my curious spirit have allowed me to grow in Hospitality and Renewable Energy industries, performing in the areas of Operations, Human Resources, Business Development and Customer Service.

I am a strong-willed, organized and detail-oriented person with interpersonal skills and a responsible attitude to any task that I undertake. This has brought me an extensive experience leading structuring and reorganization processes, in search of improving results and achieving goals of the companies I have worked for.

I enjoy joining companies where my experience and skills can be shared, feeling that my goals and aspirations are aligned with my position.
